name: Resistance Of Light - Mom Edition
description:
Resistance Of Light - Mom Edition 

---

A game for Windows PC x64

Demons have invaded your street and Mom fights back against them!  Kill all the demons (with love!).

CONTROLS:

D:  move forwards

A:  move back

J or Numpad 1:  shoot hearts

K or Numpad2:  jump

P:  pause game

ESC:  quit to desktop

---

Made with desktop Dell Windows 10 x64 PC, Unreal Engine 4, GIMP, Pro-Motion NG, Acoustica Mixcraft 8, various VSTis.  Pictures taken with Samsung J series Android phone.

All assets (music, sprites, sounds), graphics, game design, Blueprint scripts by Jerome Lebel
